Sync tables now

—8<— “AuroraBugTracking/bugs.md:3”

Update tables

Automatically updated nightly. To update now, wait 10-15s after last change to AuroraBugTracking Issues, then run (anywhere on a machine that has authenticated with gh): bash linenums="1" gh workflow run "Update Submodules" --repo "argonne-lcf/user-guides" && GH_FORCE_TTY=100% watch -c -n1 gh run list --repo "argonne-lcf/user-guides" And wait ~2m until no jobs are running.

Or execute aurora-bug-table-sync.sh to automatically run everything step-by-step and know exactly when the changes are live online.
